text: Ra smarana gara jaba ‘‘musa(alaihis'salama)le’’ aphno kaumasita bhane ki he mero samudayaka manisaharu timile mala'i kina duhkha dinchau, jaba ki timi jandachau ki ma timro lagi allahale patha'eko rasula hum, ani jaba uniharule bangopana apana'e ta allahale pani unako hrdayala'i badhi bango bana'idiyo. Ra allahale avajnakariharula'i sojho marga dekha'umdaina
